2356
2357  /**
2358   * An abstract partial {@link Semantics} that permits subtyping.
2359   *
2360   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2361   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2362   */
2363  @Experimental
2364  public static abstract class VariantSemantics extends Semantics {
2365
2366
2367    /*
2368     * Constructors.
2369     */
2370
2371
2372    /**
2373     * Creates a new {@link VariantSemantics}.
2374     */
2375    protected VariantSemantics() {
2376      super();
2377    }
2378
2379
2380    /*
2381     * Instance methods.
2382     */
2383
2384
2385    /**
2386     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
2387     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadClass} is assignable
2388     * to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied {@code
2389     * receiverClass}, according to the assignability rules modeled by
2390     * this {@link Semantics} instance, and if and only if {@code
2391     * payloadClass} models a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not
2392     * any other type, and if and only if {@code receiverClass} models
2393     * a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not any other type.
2394     *
2395     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
2396     * method.</p>
2397     *
2398     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if
2399     * {@link Type#supertype(Type)
2400     * receiverClass.supertype(payloadClass)} returns {@code true}.
2401     *
2402     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
2403     * receiverClass}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
2404     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
2405     *
2406     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
2407     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2408     *
2409     * @param receiverClass the receiver type as described above; must
2410     * not be {@code null}
2411     *
2412     * @param payloadClass the payload type as described above; must
2413     * not be {@code null}
2414     *
2415     * @return {@code true} if and only if {@link Type#supertype(Type)
2416     * receiverClass.supertype(payloadClass)} returns {@code true}
2417     *
2418     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
2419     * idempotent and deterministic.
2420     *
2421     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
2422     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
2423     *
2424     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
2425     */
2426    @Override
2427    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2428      return receiverClass.supertype(payloadClass);
2429    }
2430
2431    /**
2432     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
2433     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadGenericArrayType} is
2434     * assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the
2435     * supplied {@code receiverGenericArrayType}, according to the
2436     * assignability rules modeled by this {@link Semantics} instance,
2437     * and if and only if {@code payloadGenericArrayType} models a
2438     * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array
2439     * type} and not any other type, and if and only if {@code
2440     * receiverGenericArrayType} models a {@linkplain
2441     * java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array type} and not
2442     * any other type.
2443     *
2444     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
2445     * method.</p>
2446     *
2447     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if the
2448     * {@linkplain Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
2449     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
2450     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
2451     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}.</p>
2452     *
2453     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
2454     * receiverGenericArrayType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
2455     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
2456     *
2457     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
2458     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2459     *
2460     * @param receiverGenericArrayType the receiver type as described
2461     * above; must not be {@code null}
2462     *
2463     * @param payloadGenericArrayType the payload type as described
2464     * above; must not be {@code null}
2465     *
2466     * @return {@code true} if and only if the {@linkplain
2467     * Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
2468     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
2469     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
2470     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}
2471     *
2472     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
2473     * idempotent and deterministic.
2474     *
2475     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
2476     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
2477     *
2478     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
2479     */
2480    @Override
2481    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
2482                                                                                    final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2483      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
2484    }
2485
2486    final <X> List<? extends Type<X>> condense(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds) {
2487      if (!bounds.isEmpty()) {
2488        final Type<X> firstBound = bounds.get(0);
2489        if (firstBound.named() && firstBound.upperBounded()) {
2490          // it's a type variable
2491          return this.condense(firstBound.upperBounds());
2492        }
2493      }
2494      return bounds;
2495    }
2496
2497  }
2498
2499
2500  /**
2501   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements Java
2502   * type assignability semantics, which are covariant.
2503   *
2504   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2505   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2506   */
2507  @Experimental
2508  public static class CovariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2509
2510
2511    /*
2512     * Static fields.
2513     */
2514
2515
2516    /**
2517     * A convenient instance of {@link CovariantSemantics}.
2518     *
2519     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
2520     */
2521    public static final CovariantSemantics INSTANCE = new CovariantSemantics();
2522
2523
2524    /*
2525     * Constructors.
2526     */
2527
2528
2529    /**
2530     * Creates a new {@link CovariantSemantics}.
2531     */
2532    public CovariantSemantics() {
2533      super();
2534    }
2535
2536
2537    /*
2538     * Instance methods.
2539     */
2540
2541
2542    @Override
2543    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2544      return this.assignable(receiverClass, payloadParameterizedType.type());
2545    }
2546
2547    @Override
2548    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2549      final Type<X> receiverComponentType = receiverClass.componentType();
2550      return
2551        this.assignable(receiverComponentType == null ? receiverClass : receiverComponentType,
2552                        payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
2553    }
2554
2555    @Override
2556    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
2557      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadType.upperBounds()) {
2558        if (this.assignable(receiverType, bound)) {
2559          return true;
2560        }
2561      }
2562      return false;
2563    }
2564
2565    @Override
2566    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2567      // Raw types are assignable and either the payload is a generic
2568      // class (and therefore a raw class) or the payload is a class
2569      // whose parameterized supertypes need to be evaluated.
2570      return
2571        this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadClass) &&
2572        (payloadClass.hasTypeParameters() ||
2573         this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadClass.supertypes()));
2574    }
2575
2576    @Override
2577    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2578                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2579      return this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadParameterizedType.supertypes());
2580    }
2581
2582    private final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2583                                                                          final Iterable<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypes) {
2584      for (final Type<Y> payloadType : payloadTypes) {
2585        if (payloadType.hasTypeArguments() &&
2586            this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(receiverParameterizedType, payloadType)) {
2587          return true;
2588        }
2589      }
2590      return false;
2591    }
2592
2593    private final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2594                                                                                     final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2595      if (receiverParameterizedType.type().represents(payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
2596        final List<? extends Type<X>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2597        final List<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2598        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
2599          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
2600            final Type<X> receiverTypeTypeArgument = receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
2601            final Type<Y> payloadTypeTypeArgument = payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
2602            if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.wildcard() || payloadTypeTypeArgument.wildcard()) {
2603              if (!this.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArgument, payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
2604                return false;
2605              }
2606            } else if (!receiverTypeTypeArgument.represents(payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
2607              return false;
2608            }
2609          }
2610          return true;
2611        }
2612      }
2613      return false;
2614    }
2615
2616    @Override
2617    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2618                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2619      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds()) {
2620        if (this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType, bound)) {
2621          return true;
2622        }
2623      }
2624      return false;
2625    }
2626
2627    @Override
2628    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
2629                                                                         final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2630      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadClass.componentType());
2631    }
2632
2633
2634    @Override
2635    protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
2636                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2637      return receiverTypeVariable.supertype(payloadTypeVariable);
2638    }
2639
2640    @Override
2641    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2642                                                                     final boolean lowerBounded,
2643                                                                     final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2644      return
2645        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadClass) &&
2646        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadClass, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2647    }
2648
2649    @Override
2650    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2651                                                                                 final boolean lowerBounded,
2652                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2653      return
2654        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadParameterizedType) &&
2655        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadParameterizedType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2656    }
2657
2658    @Override
2659    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2660                                                                                final boolean lowerBounded,
2661                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2662      return
2663        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadGenericArrayType) &&
2664        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadGenericArrayType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2665    }
2666
2667    @Override
2668    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2669                                                                            final boolean lowerBounded,
2670                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2671      return
2672        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadTypeVariable) &&
2673        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadTypeVariable, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2674    }
2675
2676    @Override
2677    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2678                                                                            final boolean receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded,
2679                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadWildcardType,
2680                                                                            final boolean payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
2681      final Type<X> receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound = receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0);
2682      if (this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0))) {
2683        if (receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
2684          return
2685            payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded &&
2686            this.assignable(payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0), receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
2687        }
2688        return
2689          !payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded ||
2690          this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
2691      }
2692      return false;
2693    }
2694
2695
2696  }
2697
2698  /**
2699   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that does not permit
2700   * subtyping, but that compares wildcard types covariantly.
2701   *
2702   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2703   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2704   */
2705  @Experimental
2706  public static class InvariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2707
2708
2709    /*
2710     * Static fields.
2711     */
2712
2713
2714    /**
2715     * An instance of {@link InvariantSemantics}.
2716     *
2717     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
2718     */
2719    public static final InvariantSemantics INSTANCE = new InvariantSemantics();
2720
2721
2722    /*
2723     * Constructors.
2724     */
2725
2726
2727    /**
2728     * Creates a new {@link InvariantSemantics}.
2729     */
2730    public InvariantSemantics() {
2731      super();
2732    }
2733
2734
2735    /*
2736     * Instance methods.
2737     */
2738
2739
2740    @Override // VariantSemantics
2741    public <X, Y> boolean assignable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
2742      if (receiverType.wildcard() || payloadType.wildcard()) {
2743        return CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(receiverType, payloadType);
2744      }
2745      return receiverType.represents(payloadType);
2746    }
2747
2748  }
2749
2750  /**
2751   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements the
2752   * rules of <a
2753   * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
2754   * target="_parent"><em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.
2755   *
2756   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2757   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2758   */
2759  @Experimental
2760  public static class CdiSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2761
2762
2763    /*
2764     * Static fields.
2765     */
2766
2767
2768    /**
2769     * An instance of {@link CdiSemantics}.
2770     *
2771     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
2772     */
2773    public static final CdiSemantics INSTANCE = new CdiSemantics();
2774
2775
2776    /*
2777     * Constructors.
2778     */
2779
2780
2781    /**
2782     * Creates a new {@link CdiSemantics}.
2783     */
2784    public CdiSemantics() {
2785      super();
2786    }
2787
2788
2789    /*
2790     * Instance methods.
2791     */
2792
2793
2794    /**
2795     * Returns {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
2796     * represents an <em>actual type</em>, which the <a
2797     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#assignable_parameters"
2798     * target="_parent">CDI specification</a> implies, but does not
2799     * explicitly state, is either a class, a parameterized type or a
2800     * generic array type.
2801     *
2802     * <p>Actual types, though not defined, are <a
2803     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
2804     * target="_parent">critically important to CDI's concept of
2805     * <em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.</p>
2806     *
2807     * <p>The concept of an actual type is not mentioned in the <a
2808     * href="https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se17/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.1"
2809     * target="_parent">Java Language Specification</a>.
2810     *
2811     * @param type the {@link Type} in question; must not be {@code
2812     * null}
2813     *
2814     * @return {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
2815     * returns {@code false} from invocations of both its {@link
2816     * #upperBounded()} and {@link #lowerBounded()} methods; {@code
2817     * false} otherwise
2818     *
2819     * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}
2820     *
2821     * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
2822     *
2823     * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by
2824     * multiple threads.
2825     */
2826    public final boolean actualType(final Type<?> type) {
2827      return !type.upperBounded() && !type.lowerBounded();
2828    }
2829
2830    @Convenience
2831    @Override
2832    public final boolean assignable(final java.lang.reflect.Type receiverType,
2833                                    final java.lang.reflect.Type payloadType,
2834                                    final boolean ignoredBox) {
2835      // Boxing is always required in CDI.
2836      return this.assignable(CdiType.of(receiverType), CdiType.of(payloadType));
2837    }
2838
2839    @Override
2840    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass,
2841                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2842      if (receiverClass.represents(payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
2843        for (final Type<Y> payloadTypeTypeArgument : payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
2844          if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
2845            // OK
2846          } else if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
2847            final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds = payloadTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
2848            switch (bounds.size()) {
2849            case 0:
2850              // OK
2851              break;
2852            case 1:
2853              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
2854                return false;
2855              }
2856              break;
2857            default:
2858              return false;
2859            }
2860          } else {
2861            return false;
2862          }
2863        }
2864        return true;
2865      }
2866      return false;
2867    }
2868
2869    @Override
2870    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2871                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2872      if (receiverParameterizedType.type().represents(payloadClass)) {
2873        for (final Type<X> receiverTypeTypeArgument : receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
2874          if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
2875            // OK
2876          } else if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
2877            final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds = receiverTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
2878            switch (bounds.size()) {
2879            case 0:
2880              // OK
2881              break;
2882            case 1:
2883              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
2884                return false;
2885              }
2886              break;
2887            default:
2888              return false;
2889            }
2890          } else {
2891            return false;
2892          }
2893        }
2894        return true;
2895      }
2896      return false;
2897    }
2898
2899    @Override
2900    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2901                                                                                      final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2902      if (receiverParameterizedType.type().represents(payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
2903        final List<? extends Type<X>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2904        final List<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2905        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
2906          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
2907            if (!CdiTypeArgumentSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i), payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i))) {
2908              return false;
2909            }
2910          }
2911          return true;
2912        }
2913      }
2914      return false;
2915    }
2916
2917
2918    /*
2919     * Inner and nested classes.
2920     */
2921
2922
2923    @Experimental
2924    private static class CdiTypeArgumentSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2925
2926      private static final CdiTypeArgumentSemantics INSTANCE = new CdiTypeArgumentSemantics();
2927
2928      private CdiTypeArgumentSemantics() {
2929        super();
2930      }
2931
2932      @Override
2933      protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverClass,
2934                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2935        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverClass, payloadTypeVariable);
2936      }
2937
2938      @Override
2939      protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2940                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2941        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverParameterizedType, payloadTypeVariable);
2942      }
2943
2944      @Override
2945      protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
2946                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2947        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverGenericArrayType, payloadTypeVariable);
2948      }
2949
2950      private final <X, Y> boolean actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverActualType,
2951                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2952        // Section 5.2.4 of the CDI specification is mealy-mouthed but
2953        // interpretable:
2954        //
2955        // "…the required type parameter [receiverActualType] is an
2956        // actual type [never defined, but implied by other sentences
2957        // scattered throughout the specification to be either a
2958        // class, parameterized type or generic array type], the bean
2959        // type parameter is a type variable [payloadTypeVariable] and
2960        // the actual type [receiverActualType] is assignable to the
2961        // upper bound[s], if any [there will always be one], of the
2962        // type variable [payloadTypeVariable], or…"
2963        //
2964        // So perhaps somewhat counterintuitively check all the bounds
2965        // of the *payload* and see if the *receiver* is assignable to
2966        // all of them.
2967        for (final Type<Y> bound : this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds())) {
2968          // Note that this is somewhat backwards to what you may expect.
2969          if (!CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound, receiverActualType)) {
2970            return false;
2971          }
2972        }
2973        return true;
2974      }
2975
2976      @Override
2977      protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
2978                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2979        // Section 5.2.4 again:
2980        //
2981        // "…the required type parameter and the bean type parameter are
2982        // both type variables and the upper bound of the required [receiver]
2983        // type parameter is assignable to the upper bound, if any, of
2984        // the bean [payload] type parameter."
2985        //
2986        // The first of many problems with this:
2987        //
2988        // This is of course ambiguous.  See
2989        // https://issues.redhat.com/browse/CDI-440 which was
2990        // unceremoniously closed for no good reason.
2991        //
2992        // "For example, the bullet
2993        //
2994        // * the required type parameter and the bean type parameter
2995        //   are both type variables and the upper bound of the
2996        //   required type parameter is assignable to the upper bound,
2997        //   if any, of the bean type parameter.
2998        //
2999        // should have meaning similar to:
3000        //
3001        // for each upper bound T of the bean type parameter, there is
3002        // an (at least one) upper bound of the required type which is
3003        // assignable to T."
3004        //
3005        // This is not normal Java/covariant semantics.  In Java, if
3006        // you have two type variables, A extends Object and B extends
3007        // Object, you cannot assign B to A or vice versa.  Here, the
3008        // CDI specification is essentially performing a kind of type
3009        // erasure in this one case.
3010        //
3011        // In CDI, when a type variable is a type argument (by
3012        // definition of a parameterized type), the platform basically
3013        // erases it.  In CDI you cannot have a type-variable-typed
3014        // injection point, because of course you can't predict what
3015        // "value" that injection point's type will have at
3016        // application analysis time.  So it stands to reason that if
3017        // there is a type variable "anywhere in" the injection point
3018        // (as a type argument, say) it will effectively be erased to
3019        // its bounds.
3020        return this.match(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds(), receiverTypeVariable.upperBounds());
3021      }
3022
3023      @Override
3024      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3025                                                                       final boolean lowerBounded,
3026                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3027        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadClass);
3028      }
3029
3030      @Override
3031      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3032                                                                                   final boolean lowerBounded,
3033                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3034        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadParameterizedType);
3035      }
3036
3037      @Override
3038      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3039                                                                                  final boolean lowerBounded,
3040                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3041        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadGenericArrayType);
3042      }
3043
3044      private final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3045                                                                          final boolean lowerBounded,
3046                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadActualType) {
3047        return
3048          (!lowerBounded || this.match(payloadActualType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds())) &&
3049          this.match(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds(), payloadActualType);
3050      }
3051
3052      @Override
3053      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3054                                                                              final boolean lowerBounded,
3055                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3056        final List<? extends Type<Y>> condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds = this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds());
3057        if (!lowerBounded || this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds(), true)) {
3058          final List<? extends Type<X>> condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds = this.condense(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds());
3059          return
3060            this.match(condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false, condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false) ||
3061            this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false);
3062        }
3063        return false;
3064      }
3065
3066      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
3067        return this.match(bound0, bounds1, true);
3068      }
3069
3070      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1, final boolean condense1) {
3071        if (!bounds1.isEmpty()) {
3072          if (condense1) {
3073            bounds1 = this.condense(bounds1);
3074          }
3075          boolean match = false;
3076          for (final Type<?> bound1 : bounds1) {
3077            if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
3078              match = true;
3079              break;
3080            }
3081          }
3082          if (!match) {
3083            return false;
3084          }
3085        }
3086        return true;
3087      }
3088
3089      private final <X> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final Type<?> bound1) {
3090        return this.match(bounds0, true, bound1);
3091      }
3092
3093      private final <X> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final boolean condense0, final Type<?> bound1) {
3094        if (!bounds0.isEmpty()) {
3095          if (condense0) {
3096            bounds0 = this.condense(bounds0);
3097          }
3098          boolean match = false;
3099          for (final Type<X> bound0 : bounds0) {
3100            if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
3101              match = true;
3102              break;
3103            }
3104          }
3105          if (!match) {
3106            return false;
3107          }
3108        }
3109        return true;
3110      }
3111
3112      private final <X, Y> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
3113        return this.match(bounds0, true, bounds1, true);
3114      }
3115
3116      private final <X, Y> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0,
3117                                         final boolean condense0,
3118                                         List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1,
3119                                         final boolean condense1) {
3120        if (!bounds0.isEmpty() && !bounds1.isEmpty()) {
3121          for (final Type<X> bound0 : condense0 ? this.condense(bounds0) : bounds0) {
3122            boolean match = false;
3123            for (final Type<Y> bound1 : condense1 ? this.condense(bounds1) : bounds1) {
3124              if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
3125                match = true;
3126                break;
3127              }
3128            }
3129            if (!match) {
3130              return false;
3131            }
3132          }
3133        }
3134        return true;
3135      }
3136
3137    }
3138  }
